poemContent: Javascript, coding,Shit, made a mistake,��"Stop spamming the comments,you're making it break"Slow bloated node sorta electron10TB ram 200% CPU spywaretaking 5 years to load inconsistentlaggy UI sorta turning out of the young hippiedrinking latte and tea.Watch the soydev as he uses his bloat IDE,on his latest apple macbook, justemptied the coffee machine, in costa coffee,hoping to work for big FAANG, stickers all over hislaptop's back,white as a cracker,thin lanky ginger beard,"black lives matter" soywojak npc, this hippieis weird,zamn I hate damn web dev,damn these soydevs weird.Proprietary, never heard of github, let alone gitlab,using open source libraries in a proprietary project.A sham,programming is what I fear.Zamn, this website is weird.
